description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to end the impunity of the perpetrators of sexual violence during the war in Kosova in the period 1998 -1999 through a restorative approach in access to justice.The specific objective of the action is to support psyc ho-social empowerment of war rape survivors from Gjakova and Deqani municipality and their legal preparation to be possibly taken to trial and remain reliable witnesses throughout the process.The project will include 47 women who continue to receiving supp ort by Medica Kosova since 2011 and 21 other women survivors of rape who have been receiving support since 2006 whereas 2 of them will act in this project as trainers on bee-care and honey production for these women. The achievement of this objective incl udes regular psychosocial counseling development of income-generating activities and legal counseling and support. These measures are expected to strengthen the women's personal resources in psychological and legal aspect of empowerment and improve their s ocial welfare in coping with retributive justice procedures of addressing war crimes in Kosova during 1998-1999.
